entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:02 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:02 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
